title: T206 McGraw with cap PSA For Sale

posts.post_title: T206 McGraw with cap PSA For Sale
posts.post_content:
I have to sell my T206 McGraw after much deliberation.  It has a lot of eye appeal for the grade.  Paypal gift /payment owed preferred.  Price is delivered.

T206 John McGraw SGC 30 Sweet Caporal $65 SOLD :)
